requirements.summary: Create a responsive public marketing site with consistent layout, navigation, accessibility, and SEO-friendly structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Site loads as a public-facing company website with consistent header/navigation and footer
All pages are responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and accessible (semantic headings, keyboard navigation)
All user-facing text is in English

file_operations.description: Create the root app shell with a consistent header + footer layout, and set up client-side routing for the public marketing site (no auth required).
Create an accessible, responsive header with primary navigation links for all core pages and a mobile-friendly menu behavior.
Create a consistent footer with company name, basic links, and placeholder contact details; ensure semantic markup and keyboard accessibility.
Add/adjust SEO basics (title consistency, meta description/keywords placeholders) and ensure HTML lang stays set to English (en).

requirements.summary: Implement core pages: Home, About, Products catalog, Manufacturing/Infrastructure, Quality/Standards, and Contact with SPA navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links to each page/section and route changes work without full page reload
Products page shows multiple product categories with short descriptions and placeholder/spec fields (e.g., material/grade/finish/size range)
Contact page shows company contact details (address/phone/email placeholders) and a contact form

file_operations.description: Create the Home page with section-based layout, semantic headings, and CTA linking to the Contact route.
Create the About page with company overview content placeholders in English and an accessible layout.
Create the Products page showing nuts/bolts categories in a simple catalog-style layout with placeholder/spec fields (material/grade/finish/size range).
Create the Manufacturing/Infrastructure page with section blocks for machinery, capacity, and facilities (placeholders), keeping content in English.
Create the Quality/Standards page with placeholders for certifications, inspection, tolerances, and QA process; use semantic headings.
Create the Contact page that displays placeholder address/phone/email plus renders the inquiry form component.
Wire all newly created pages into the router and ensure header navigation points to each route without full page reload.
Wire navigation links to Home, About, Products, Manufacturing/Infrastructure, Quality/Standards, and Contact; include an accessible active-state pattern.

requirements.summary: Add a validated contact/inquiry form that submits to the Motoko backend and shows success/error feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes: name, company (optional), email, phone (optional), message
Client-side validation prevents empty name/email/message and shows readable error messages
On submit, an inquiry record is persisted in the backend and the UI shows a success state

file_operations.description: Implement the inquiry form UI (name, company optional, email, phone optional, message) with basic client-side validation and clear inline error messages; show success/error states after submission.
Create a small hook that uses useActor() to call the backend submitInquiry(email, subject, message); compose subject/message to include name/company/phone while keeping required backend parameters.
Render the InquiryForm on the Contact page and display a clear post-submit success message; ensure content remains fully public (no login).

requirements.summary: Apply an industrial visual theme (steel/graphite neutrals + single non-blue/purple accent) with consistent Tailwind styling and strong typography.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme (colors, typography, spacing, button styles) is used across all pages
Home page includes a hero section, key highlights (e.g., product range/quality/lead time placeholders), and a clear call-to-action leading to Contact
No blue/purple is used as the primary theme unless explicitly required by later user input

file_operations.description: Define Tailwind base/components/utilities and set global CSS variables for a steel/graphite neutral palette with a single accent color (e.g., orange/amber), plus base typography defaults (English-only).
Adjust theme extension as needed to align with the industrial palette via existing CSS variables; ensure the accent/primary is not blue/purple.
Implement the hero section, highlights (product range/quality/lead time placeholders), and a prominent CTA button/link to Contact using consistent Tailwind styles.
Apply consistent Tailwind styling for navigation (typography, spacing, focus states) matching the industrial theme.
Apply consistent Tailwind styling for footer layout and typography matching the industrial theme.

requirements.summary: Add generated static brand and homepage imagery under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo + homepage visuals).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are committed under frontend/public/assets/generated
Header uses the generated logo asset
Home page uses the generated hero image and at least one additional generated visual element

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/gkmi-logo.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated homepage hero image at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-fasteners.dim_1920x800.png.
Add the generated line icon set image at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/icons-fasteners-set.dim_512x512.png.
Render the generated logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/gkmi-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header (with alt text and proper sizing).

Render the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-fasteners.dim_1920x800.png in the Home hero section and use frontend/public/assets/generated/icons-fasteners-set.dim_512x512.png as a visual element for homepage highlights (e.g., quality/manufacturing/delivery).
